name: PNC00001 UCB-J consortium
description: Collection of datasets using the 11C-UCB-J tracer for imaging the synaptic vesicle glycoprotein 2A. Datasets contain a unique collection of healthy subjects and patients with Parkinson's disease. In addition of PET data, datasets include anatomical MRI and other MRI modalities (DWI, Perfusion, fMRI). This consortium brings together research centers across the world, with interest in synaptic density and diseases affecting neural transmission.

Description: Collection of PET datasets using the 11C-UCB-J tracer for imaging the synaptic vesicle glycoprotein 2A
License: Data User Agreement - restricted access until 2030
Information: To access those UCB-J data, you must be a partner in the consortium.
funding: Data hosting is generously provided by Novo Nordisk Foundation (NNF20OC0063277)
